video.title: Littlest Pet Shop
video.synopsis: Blythe discovers that she can talk to the animals at the Littlest Pet Shop, a day camp for all types of pets, kicking off a series of fun adventures.

episodes.synopsis: When Blythe Baxter and her dad move into an apartment above the Littlest Pet Shop, she discovers that she can communicate with the animals.
episodes.title: Blythe's Big Adventure: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: To keep the shop from closing, Blythe hosts a fashion show for the pets. Unfortunately, the rich Biskit twins try to ruin the event.
episodes.title: Blythe's Big Adventure: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Blythe inadvertently gives Zoe a terrible haircut. Meanwhile, the other pets try to make Minka an art superstar.
episodes.title: Bad Hair Day

episodes.synopsis: When Zoe discovers that her sister is trapped inside the Largest Ever Pet Shop, it's up to Blythe and the pets to break her out.
episodes.title: Gailbreak!

episodes.synopsis: Pepper tries her hand at insult comedy -- much to Penny's chagrin. Meanwhile, Blythe defends the Biskit twins against a bully.
episodes.title: Penny for Your Laughs

episodes.synopsis: Penny dislikes the outfit that Blythe is designing for her to wear to a charity ball but is reluctant to voice her disapproval.
episodes.title: Mean Isn't Your Color

episodes.synopsis: When Russell is pressured into loosening up, he changes into something he isn't. Meanwhile, a friend of Blythe's tries to mimic her personality.
episodes.title: Russell Up Some Fun

episodes.synopsis: With help from Sunil's "psychic abilities," Blythe attempts to find a boy who dropped his keys in the park.
episodes.title: Blythe's Crush

episodes.synopsis: When Blythe overloads the dumbwaiter, she finds herself stuck in it with Zoe, Pepper and Minka -- leaving it up to Penny to lead a rescue mission.
episodes.title: Dumb Dumbwaiter

episodes.synopsis: While Mrs. Twombly is away, Blythe does her best to keep the peace between Zoe and her longtime rival Madame Pom.
episodes.title: Eve of Destruction

episodes.synopsis: Blythe wants the Biskit twins to join the Mathlete team after overhearing them use a secret language to solve complex math problems.
episodes.title: Books and Covers

episodes.synopsis: Vinnie gets to visit the set of his favorite dance show. When the judges reject him, he's befriended by a troupe of street-dancing lizards.
episodes.title: So You Skink You Can Dance

episodes.synopsis: After switching places with famous movie mongoose Shahrukh, Sunil discovers that the life of a film star isn't all it's cracked up to be.
episodes.title: Lights, Camera, Mongoose!

episodes.synopsis: Russell hitches a ride to school with Blythe inside her new backpack -- and promptly gets lost on campus.
episodes.title: Trading Places

episodes.synopsis: The pets gorge on sugary treats after getting trapped in a sweet shop pantry with Buttercream, a rabbit owned by Youngmee's Aunt Christie.
episodes.title: Topped with Buttercream

episodes.synopsis: When the pets accidentally slip Aunt Christie's new catering truck into gear and send it careening down the street, Blythe takes the blame.
episodes.title: Sweet (Truck) Ride

episodes.synopsis: Wishing to spend more time with his daughter, Blythe's father surprises her at school. Meanwhile, Minka tries to befriend an antisocial tortoise.
episodes.title: Helicopter Dad

episodes.synopsis: While helping Youngmee fill a huge cupcake order for the Biskit twins, Blythe accidentally loses her favorite necklace in the batter.
episodes.title: What's in the Batter?

episodes.synopsis: When Blythe comes down with a cold, she finds that she can't understand the pets anymore. Meanwhile, Vinnie is accidentally transported to the dump.
episodes.title: What Did You Say?

episodes.synopsis: As Blythe and her friends prepare for a cake-baking contest, the pets and Buttercream try to keep the Biskits from cheating their way to victory.
episodes.title: Bakers and Fakers

episodes.synopsis: When Blythe and Zoe appear on the "Terriers and Tiaras" reality show, Blythe discovers that such competitions bring out the worst in people.
episodes.title: Terriers and Tiaras

episodes.synopsis: Pepper works hard to earn the approval of her comedy idol when he visits the Littlest Pet Shop. Meanwhile, Blythe learns a secret about Mrs. Twombly.
episodes.title: Lotsa Luck

episodes.synopsis: When Fisher Biskit outbids Mrs. Twombly for a highly coveted doorknob at an auction, she and Blythe visit the Biskit mansion to see the knob.
episodes.title: Door-Jammed

episodes.synopsis: Zoe and Pepper clash as they're planning a party for Penny. Meanwhile, Vinnie is shocked when he becomes a better dancer after losing his tail.
episodes.title: Frenemies

episodes.synopsis: While hunting for Mrs. Twombly's missing glasses, Blythe meets a charming squirrel named Shivers -- who has a hoarding problem.
episodes.title: Blythe's Pet Project

episodes.synopsis: After being accepted into the junior program at a famed fashion school, Blythe must deal with the angst of leaving family and friends for the summer.
episodes.title: Summertime Blues

episodes.synopsis: While Blythe is away at fashion camp, the pets come up with a plan to visit her for the day via Mrs. Twombly's brand-new Littlest Pet Shuttle.
episodes.title: Missing Blythe

episodes.synopsis: When Blythe starts a fashion fad with her wild Nest Hat, it's up to the pets to care for the newly hatched chick who was previously an egg in her hat.
episodes.title: The Nest Hats Craze

episodes.synopsis: Russell is excited about his first overnight stay at the pet shop with Blythe -- until his irrational fear of ghosts interferes.
episodes.title: Eight Arms to Hold You

episodes.synopsis: After Sunil becomes a hero to the raccoons of City Park by facing down an escaped cobra, he must decide whether to stay and be their king.
episodes.title: Heart of Parkness

episodes.synopsis: The shop is in an uproar when a woman claiming to be a pet psychic sets up shop in the store and tells everyone what their pets are really thinking.
episodes.title: Pawlm Reading

episodes.synopsis: A reality TV show informs Mrs. Twombly that there's treasure rumored to be buried under the shop, and flashbacks reveal how the shop got its start.
episodes.title: Treasure of the Henrietta Twombly

episodes.synopsis: Sunil's picture on the Web becomes a viral sensation, sending Zoe into fits of jealousy and the Biskit twins into fits of vanity.
episodes.title: What Meme Worry

episodes.synopsis: When Blythe discovers her costume designs for a parade have been stolen by another designer, she enlists the pets to help her prove the work is hers.
episodes.title: The Big Feathered Parade

episodes.synopsis: When the pets get lost in a museum, it's up to Blythe to track them down before the museum closes or she is caught by the security guard.
episodes.title: A Day at the Museum

episodes.synopsis: Blythe fights to regain her confidence after a critique session with a famously intimidating fashion editor, while the pets contend with a new camper.
episodes.title: Alligators and Handbags

episodes.synopsis: Blythe trades in her scooter for a sales kiosk so she can enter the International Pet Fashion Expo. Roger's airline launches a "Pet Jet" service.
episodes.title: Blythe's Big Idea

episodes.synopsis: Business is slow at the Littlest Pet Shop so Mrs. Twombly agrees to let Blythe and her friends shoot a TV commercial.
episodes.title: Commercial Success

episodes.synopsis: When the pets share their most interesting stories, Penny Ling invents a fascinating tale in which she saves "the green bean fairies."
episodes.title: So Interesting

episodes.synopsis: Blythe fills in for Zoe's owners and accompanies her to a dog show in Paris. Soon, both are smitten: Blythe with Paris and Zoe with a street dog.
episodes.title: To Paris with Zoe

episodes.synopsis: Penny Ling convinces Sunil that he has superpowers to give him confidence. Blythe helps find the perfect parking spot for the Sweet Delights truck.
episodes.title: Super Sunil

episodes.synopsis: Pepper is smitten with a visitor to the day camp but has no idea how to talk to him. Blythe has her hands full baby-sitting Buttercream.
episodes.title: Sweet Pepper

episodes.synopsis: Blythe and the pets travel to Shanghai to attend a ceremony honoring Mrs. Twombly as the originator of Kung Fu Quilting.
episodes.title: Shanghai Hi-Jinks

episodes.synopsis: When Roger is temporarily laid off, he takes a job as the Biskit twins' personal assistant and chauffeur, much to Blythe's dismay.
episodes.title: Grounded

episodes.synopsis: Blythe runs for class president against the Biskits. Meanwhile, the pets suffer escalating annoyance from a mysterious droning buzz in the shop.
episodes.title: Inside Job

episodes.synopsis: Blythe and the pets compete in the Carnival parade in Rio de Janeiro, but an old nemesis shows up as well, determined to defeat them.
episodes.title: Plane it on Rio!

episodes.synopsis: Bigfoot fanatic Roger Baxter buys a camper trailer and takes Blythe and the pets on a camping trip.
episodes.title: Littlest Bigfoot

episodes.synopsis: When Sunil and Vinnie have a falling out, it's up to Blythe and Russell to figure out how to get these two best pals back together again.
episodes.title: Sunil's Sick Day

episodes.synopsis: Both Russell and Blythe find themselves in isolation due to real, but mostly imagined, circumstances.
episodes.title: The Hedgehog In The Plastic Bubble

episodes.synopsis: Pepper feeds Blythe jokes at a stand-up comedy contest. The pets concoct a plan to make Minka believe that she is the first monkey to land on Mars.
episodes.title: Standup Stinker

episodes.synopsis: Blythe is stressing about both the upcoming International Pet Fashion Expo and a photo shoot she's been asked to do for a top fashion magazine.
episodes.title: The Expo Factor Pt. 1

episodes.synopsis: Blythe makes it to the Pet Expo, but the Biskits sabotage her, making her think her nightmares about everything going wrong are coming true!
episodes.title: The Expo Factor Pt. 2

episodes.synopsis: After sighting what they believe to be a UFO, the pets become convinced that Downtown City is being invaded by aliens.
episodes.title: War of the Weirds

episodes.synopsis: Russell is determined to put a stop to a secret pet "cupid," but ends up under her spell while Blythe tries to sort through her feelings for Josh Sharp.
episodes.title: Secret Cupet

episodes.synopsis: Blythe fills in for the assistant to the demanding "Très Blasé" magazine editor while Russell and Zoe contend with a passive-aggressive pet model.
episodes.title: Some Assistance Required

episodes.synopsis: Blythe and Zoe are accidentally whisked away for a weekend at the Biskits' winter chateau; the pets cheer up a visiting homesick penguin.
episodes.title: Winter Wonder Wha…?

episodes.synopsis: Vinnie and Sunil entertain Mr. Von Fuzzlebutt, a new day camper, while Fisher tries to figure out the secret to Littlest Pet Shop's recent success.
episodes.title: Sleeper

episodes.synopsis: A massive snow storm hits Downtown City, trapping Blythe and the pets at Littlest Pet Shop.
episodes.title: Snow Stormin'

episodes.synopsis: When stolen merchandise from Largest Ever Pet Shop mysteriously ends up in Blythe's dumbwaiter, an investigation leads to a system of tubes.
episodes.title: Hamster Hoods

episodes.synopsis: Word gets out to the Downtown City pet population that Blythe can understand them, and the pet shop is besieged by those seeking her advice.
episodes.title: Tongue Tied

episodes.synopsis: Penny Ling is excited to meet the host of her favorite TV nature show, Tess McSavage, but the famous zoologist is less than thrilled to meet Penny.
episodes.title: What's So Scary About the Jungle? Everything!

episodes.synopsis: Blythe has to convince the Biskits to keep twin chinchillas for just one day, while Sunil tries to prove to Minka that he can paint as well as her.
episodes.title: Two Pets for Two Pests

episodes.synopsis: Blythe may have to share her secret with Youngmee to save her from looking foolish on a television show and to save their friendship.
episodes.title: The Secret Recipe

episodes.synopsis: When Brittany gets a higher grade on a test, she shuns Whittany and starts hanging out with Blythe and the other "smart kids."
episodes.title: Feud for Thought

episodes.synopsis: The pets take a visiting dour goldfish on a wild ride under the city while Blythe spies on Josh Sharp at his new job.
episodes.title: Fish Out of Water

episodes.synopsis: When Blythe and her friends are accidentally invited to the Biskit twins' birthday party, things go from bad to worse when the pets decide to attend.
episodes.title: If the Shoe Fits

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious jungle curse shrinks the Littlest Pet Shop to the size of a dollhouse, leaving Zoe and Blythe to rescue their miniaturized friends.
episodes.title: The Very Littlest Pet Shop

episodes.synopsis: When Russell sprains some quills, he has nothing to do but stare out the back window and he catches Josh Sharp stealing Blythe's design sketches.
episodes.title: Back Window

episodes.synopsis: A kitten visitor to the day camp peppers the pets with a stream of neverending "whys" while Blythe wonders the same thing about her frilly bedroom.
episodes.title: Room Enough

episodes.synopsis: Blythe hits it off with a fashion-minded girl at a thrift shop and neglects her "old friends" while Vinnie befriends a genial spider.
episodes.title: Why Can't We Be Friends?

episodes.synopsis: Blythe and the pets must help Minka's cousin, Cheep-Cheep, who mistakenly thinks his owner has invented a helmet that allows pets to talk to humans.
episodes.title: Pet Sounds

episodes.synopsis: When Roger's competitive sister, Mo, comes for a visit, their need to constantly one-up each other gets out of control.
episodes.title: The Sister Story

episodes.synopsis: Blythe and Mrs. Twombly help a friend transform her run-down pet hotel into a showplace, while Fisher Biskit is determined to shut it down.
episodes.title: A Night at the Pawza

episodes.synopsis: The pets help a shy peacock get ready to debut at the botanical gardens; Youngmee wants Blythe to use her ability to communicate with pets for good.
episodes.title: Proud as a… Peacock?

episodes.synopsis: Blythe and friends help Sue overcome her reluctance to accept an award in front of the whole school while the pets delight in a sweet-smelling skunk.
episodes.title: Sue Syndrome

episodes.synopsis: When an obnoxious groundhog named Harold arrives at camp, Russell can't wait for the day to end, but soon realizes it never does.
episodes.title: In the Loop

episodes.synopsis: After meeting a special new day camper, Blythe races against time to achieve her dream of holding a Pet Fest in Downtown City.
episodes.title: It's the Pet Fest!: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: When the outdoor venue for Pet Fest falls through, Blythe only has only a few hours to relocate the entire event; Zoe wants to impress a new friend.
episodes.title: It's the Pet Fest!: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: As Blythe worries about her life's calling, a cranky 150-year-old tortoise arrives at the day camp and shares some eye-opening stories with her.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: While Zoe recruits the pets for a singing contest, Blythe is so wrapped up in her mom's journal that she neglects to help find some missing doorknobs.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Blythe helps Youngmee find the perfect pet friend, while the pets must deal with an escaped circus bear after it winds up at the Littlest Pet Shop.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Russell agrees to let his father live with him at the pet shop. Blythe befriends an elderly woman who wants Blythe to meet her kind granddaughters.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: On Halloween, Blythe and her pet pals have a scary storytelling contest, while a jet-lagged Roger lives his own nightmare trying to get home.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Russell is thrilled to attend the Renaissance Fair with Blythe, Vinnie and Sunil until an old pal tells him about some shady activity going on there.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: While shopping at LPS, a TV producer spies Blythe talking to the pets and is inspired to create a sitcom about a pet shop clerk who talks to animals.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: After taking a second job at the Thrifty Armoire, Blythe becomes a shopaholic, while a demanding doll left in their care drives the pets crazy.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Zoe becomes infatuated with the new veterinarian's German shepherd, while Blythe and Russell spend the night camping on a freezing mountain.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: While Blythe debuts her pet beachwear, Penny Ling meets an exercise-crazy lobster, and Sunil and Vinnie face off in a sandcastle-building contest.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Blythe competes against her former fashion camp roommate on a reality show, while the animals try to figure out what's bothering Sugar Sprinkles.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Blythe feels bad when she gets the Biskit twins in big trouble at school, and Pepper waits for punishment after breaking Vinnie's lucky rock.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: When Russell accidentally deletes his favorite show, the animals act it out for him. Blythe and Youngmee set out to rescue a spaniel from a thief.
episodes.title: Episode 13
